backend/main.mo: Main canister logic managing posts and user profiles with authorization checks, mandatory photo field enforcement, and CRUD operations on posts.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old posts to the new format by adding a default photo field and returning an updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to implemented photo‑related features with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file across the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying shared border/background defaults.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, routes, theme provider, and global toaster for the React app.
frontend/src/components/auth/IdentityInd: Shows the current user's profile name or truncated principal in a badge when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache reset on sign‑out.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter and save their name, with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header containing banner, logo, navigation, and authentication UI with identity display.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout with header, routed main content, footer, and profile‑setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostAction: Post action bar for authors providing edit navigation and a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a clickable post card with title, preview text, photo (or fallback), author snippet, and timestamp.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and saves the caller's user profile using the backend actor and react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and exposing login and logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Provides react‑query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting posts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Renders a full post view with photo, metadata, author check, and edit/delete actions for the owner.
frontend/src/pages/PostEditorPage.tsx: Handles creating and editing posts, including title/body fields, image upload, validation, and save operations.
frontend/src/pages/PostsFeedPage.tsx: Renders the main posts feed with authentication-aware UI, loading/error states, and lists PostCard components.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Provides date/time formatting helpers and principal string truncation.
frontend/src/utils/photos.ts: Implements image validation, file-to-dataURL conversion, preview utilities, and photo-related helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theming, typography, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, existing features, and pending feature requests for the family blog app.
